Class TUITitleStrategy

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.strategy.TUIStrategy
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.strategy.TUITitleStrategy
public class TUITitleStrategy extends TUIStrategy
Strategy to be used when the title screen is displayed.
